alert.note: Alert for Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 02 at 4:49PM CDT until June 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Gaines County in western Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, As Hwy 385 remains closed due to flooding 5 miles south of Seagraves have extended the Flash Flood Warning. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Seagraves, Seagraves Airport, Gaines County Park and Loop. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
